mapper.sql: id, username, telephone, email, password, nickname, name
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, telephone, email, password, nickname, name) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

nickname,
name,

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
